articles.description: The January transfer window is open for business - find out every Premier League done deal, here
articles.content: Bournemouth have splashed the cash to land Liverpool striker Dominic Solanke. The England Under-21 striker has moved to the south coast in an initial £19m deal. Solanke's former club Chelsea had kicked off the January transfer window in style by snapping up C… [+3402 chars]

articles.title: Maupay can excel at Aston Villa despite Hogan's career acting as warning - The Boot Room
articles.description: Neal Maupay is a target for Aston Villa.
articles.content: Aston Villa look set to lose star striker Tammy Abraham, who is likely to join Wolves on loan, according to The London Evening Standard and other media outlets. This could be a potentially season-shattering move for Aston Villa, who desperately need to replac… [+1302 chars]

articles.author: Jake Polden
articles.title: Paul Pogba pictured at airport as Man Utd star flies out to team-mates in Dubai - Mirror Online
articles.description: The France World Cup winner was forced to stay behind in the UK as his team-mates flew to Dubai on Saturday
articles.content: Paul Pogba was pictured at the airport on Monday before flying out to Dubai to link up with his Manchester United team-mates for some warm weather training. The France World Cup winner was forced to stay behind in the UK after picking up an injury in the Red … [+1377 chars]

articles.title: Brahim Diaz opens up on Real Madrid transfer after ex-Man City starlet unveiled - Irish Mirror
articles.description: The 19-year-old has returned to his homeland with the European champions after joining for an initial £15.5million
articles.content: Brahim Diaz says he had no choice but to leave Manchester City to join Real Madrid after completing his switch to the European champions. The Spanish midfielder completed a move to the Bernabeu on Sunday, with Los Blancos paying an initial £15.5million. Diaz … [+1636 chars]
